column5: Getaway from it all at your cozy villa on the water! Sip coffee & enjoy the sunrise off the back deck; be entertained by bird watching & fish jumping in the canal. Spend time relaxing by yourself or an exciting time with friends! With water views from the master bedroom & also the open living space, & unique coastal d√©cor and art, our spacious waterfront villa is perfect for your next visit to the coast! Features canal fishing, kayaking, boating, & wildlife viewing from your back deck!
column8: Relax & stay on the water! Welcome to Cabana East!
